numberOfChildren.title: Number of Children
numberOfChildren.description: The number of child actors to spawn (only applicable if role is 'root').

childMemoryMbytes.title: Child Memory (MB)
childMemoryMbytes.description: The memory limit for each child actor in megabytes (only applicable if role is 'root').

childTaskId.title: Child Task ID
childTaskId.description: The ID of the task to run for each child actor (only applicable if role is 'root'). If not specified, no task will be used.

waitSeconds.title: Wait Seconds
waitSeconds.description: Number of seconds to wait before finishing.

childWaitSeconds.title: Child Wait Seconds
childWaitSeconds.description: Number of seconds each child actor waits before finishing (only applicable if role is 'root').

numberToOutput.title: Number to Output
numberToOutput.description: A number to be output by the actor. If not specified, a random number will be generated.
